name: Float Some
description:
Flot·sam /ˈflätsəm/

noun

  1. the wreckage of a ship or its cargo found floating on or washed up by the sea.

You wake up on a deserted island with nothing but ripped pants and your name. Explore the island and collect enough material to make a raft. Where you end up next is anyone's guess.

#adventure #action-rpg #action #rpg #rpgpapermaker #gamejam 

Z - Inspect
D - Dig
Shift - Attack
Arrow Keys - Move
C - Magic
Space bar - Dodge


Holding CTRL, Shift and/or moving allows for different moves to be used 
All controls are interchangeable within the game.


You play as Jack, a dreadlock stranded man




The Demon

Who are late for the picnic on the beach


Bibi

Physical Attacks can be upgraded into well destructive combat moves

Find yourself immersed in the setting, Gather, Dig, and Craft your Raft
